text: What is the best way to display training/validation loss plots during training, to already see how the curves evolve from the beginning? I cannot figure out how to replace a plot in Jupyter lab (and I don't want to render tons of plots with the slightly updated curves...)

text: Ah thanks, I was trying to figure it out from Interact.jl.. `IJulia.clear_output(true)`  does the job, though flickers a bit, so I'll definitely check out the tensorboard logger!
